attributes.action: Give the police more power to combat child gangs with zero tolerance!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give back the power to the police and other organisations to deal promptly, with child gangs, violent adults with zero tollorance.

If a children are at an age when they committe a serious crime, then they should be punished for their actions.

I strongly believe that asbos dont work  and police have no reasonable powers.

We need our communities to be and feel safe, look at what is happening.  Children are being assaulted or even killed, with guns, knives, or even beaten to death!

This has to stop now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
